text: The Red Rose Transit Authority (RRTA) is a transit bus company in Lancaster, Pennsylvania. On December 1, 2014, it merged with the Berks Area Reading Transportation Authority (BARTA). Both are now subsidiaries of the South Central Transit Authority (SCTA). The SCTA owns and operates 92 buses. BARTA operates 50 buses while Red Rose Transit Authority (RRTA) operates 42 buses. Category:Transport in Pennsylvania Category:Bus transport in the United States
title: Red Rose Transit Authority
